content:
Chapter 3 had the purple seals, but Chapter 4 has the Purple Talismans. Collecting all four and getting the final one at the Court of Illumination lets you have an early visit with the Supreme Inspector. 

Supreme Inspector
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Secret_Bosses_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md", within the section "Secret Bosses in Chapter 4" and the sub-section "Supreme Inspector". The content is presented below:

Chapter 3 had the purple seals, but Chapter 4 has the Purple Talismans. Collecting all four and getting the final one at the Court of Illumination lets you have an early visit with the Supreme Inspector. 

Supreme Inspector
